.
Prohibition Under 38 CFR 3.750 of Combined Benefits to Exceed the Amount of the Greater Benefit
38 CFR 3.750(c)
prohibits the total of the monthly payments (combined VA benefits and MRP) to the Veteran from exceeding the greater amount of the following benefits:
the VA benefit, or
the MRP or retainer pay.
